Headline: Trains bypassing Central Station
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Central due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Central due to a police investigation.

  • As a result, trains are not operating only between Austin/Lake to Laramie/Lake, in both directions at this time.
  • Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
